Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Koo shololangakhwo mbu bitsoominjia Nyasaye ebili mwikulu nende khushialo nende amayoni olwakafimbulanga tsimbaya tsiako buli bioosi biamanya isaala yiyie, nende injila yokhumwitsoomeliamwo. Ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi muno khukabakholanga
Ne ni obwa Nyasaye obwami bwomwikulu nende khushialo ne ewa Nyasaye ni amakalushilo kaboosi

Koo! Shololangakhwo mbu Nyasaye ayilaanga amaleesi mana akaretsanga halala, mana akakhole libunjikho? Mana olalola ifula nirula hakari wako , naye yeshinjia okhurula hekulu khutsingulu etsia maleesi ifula yamachina mana atililakho owayenya ne eyile ehale khu owayenya okhumiesukha khwelikulu khukhaaba okhuwofusia tsimoni
Nyasaye akalukhaninjia eshilo nende eshitere toto mu ako khulimwo nende eshimanyisio khubandu abamachesi

Ne Nyasaye yaloonga buli isolo okhurulana nende amatsi, etsindi tsiatsio tsichendelanga inda yatsio, ne etsindi tsichendelanga amakulu kabili, ne etsindi natsio tsichendelanga amakulu kane, Nyasaye aloonganga shiayenya toto Nyasaye ni Omunyali wabuli eshindu
Toto khweshia tsinyaali etsinoosinjia ne Nyasaye alunjisinjia owayenya khunjila ingololofu
Ne baboolanga mbu: “ khusuubile Nyasaye nende Omurumwa, ne khuwulile” 24. mana abandi mubo imbeli wakano bakakhayanga, ne abo shibali basuubila tawe
Ne nibalangwa khu Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe kho ababusilie hakari wabu, abandi mubo bakhayanga ako
Ne nibali mbu nibo bali khubwatoto , bamwitsilanga lwangu nibehotselesiye
Koo bali nende obulwale mumioyo chiabu , nohomba bali nende tsinganakani nohomba baritsanga mbu Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe balabakholela obubii! Halali abo nibo Ababii
